race.name: Grandian
entries: Grandians possess the following racial traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: The angels of Grandia can maintain their human forms for hundreds of years. They are known to last to a little over 1000 years

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Novans typically find themselves predisposed toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Grandians appear just as their human allies. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Blessed with a radiant soul, your vision can easily cut through darkness. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Celestial Resistance
entries: You gain resistance to necrotic and radiant damage.

entries.name: Divine Legacy
entries: You know the light cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the lesser restoration spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Once you reach 5th level, you can cast the daylight spell once with this trait as a 3rd-level spell, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Nation Diplomat
entries: You have advantage on all Charisma (Persuasion) checks and all Intelligence (History) checks regarding the Nation Grande.

entries.name: Natural Linguist
entries: You can speak, read and write the Common languages of each nation that belongs to the Nation Grande.

race.name: Novan
entries: Novans possess the following racial traits:

entries.name: Age
entries: By the grace of their god and like other beast races of Prosperia, Novans tend to have rather long lifespans. The oldest Novan was known to be around 800 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Novans typically find themselves predisposed toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: While naturally stronger than the human races there are no discernable differences in height. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to the wolf blood that flows through your vains, you have superior vision in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

entries.name: Natural Craftsman
entries: You gain proficiency with the artisan’s tools of your choice: smith’s tools, woodcarver’s tools, or mason’s tools.

entries.name: Novan Combat Training
entries: You have proficiency with the battleaxe.

entries.name: Novan Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Northern Resilience
entries: You gain resistance to cold damage

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Novan. Novan is a at once a harsh, yet flowing language with many non-speakers mistaking the language for simple growls. Novan is based heavily on the Runic Script.
